name: The Travel Quest
intro: Treasure hunt around the world, on all 7 continents
summary: The Travel Quest is a treasure hunt around the world, on all 7 continents, based on a mobile application that allows you to advance in the adventure, alone or within a team

name: Pricery
intro: Treasure hunt around the world, on all 7 continents
summary: From inception to fruition, alongside my committed co-founder, I spearheaded the vision, single-handedly crafting Pricery from ideation to design and development. As the driving force behind the app, I harnessed my skills to create an innovative Android application that revolutionizes grocery shopping. Pricery stands as a testament to our dedication, offering a seamless and cost-effective solution, all within the palm of your hand.
